articles.title: European Champions Cup: Kiwi forward Brad Shields red-carded as Wasps lose to Munster - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Former Hurricanes backrower's banishment proves costly in English club's home defeat to Irish province.
articles.content:
Wasps Kiwi captain Brad Shields was sent off in a 35-14 loss to Irish team Munster in the European Champions Cup.

articles.title: Europe's Mars orbiter relays data from Chinese rover back to Earth - Space.com
articles.description: The European Space Agency's Mars Express collected data from China's Zhurong Mars rover and successfully sent it to Earth following a series of experimental communications tests.

articles.title: French cheese product imported by Cold Storage recalled due to 'possible' presence of bacteria - channelnewsasia.com
